meta.title: RedCat Multiverse
meta.twitterDescription: To begin your adventures in the RedCat Multiverse, you’ll need at least six character NFTs, which Inception NFTs provide – along with other exciting in-game perks.
meta.twitterTitle: RCM's Inception Package multiply into 6 character NFTs and trading card NFTs and more

cta.second: The Inception is RCM's Deluxe Collectible
cta.third: Game Starter Package (a collection of NFTs)
